long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Recipes for Gearman clients libraries and server

= REQUIREMENTS:

= ATTRIBUTES:

= USAGE:

The gearman::server recipe installs the gearmand job server. The gearman::ruby_lib installs the libriaries and gems needed to run Ruby clients and workers.

recipes.gearman::ruby_lib: Install the Gearman Ruby client and worker libraries

name: gearman
